thread.title: The Goal Standard Challenge: The Productivity 'Secret' Needed to Make Progress on Your Goal
thread.title_full: The Goal Standard Challenge: The Productivity 'Secret' Needed to Make Progress on Your Goal

author: Andrea Huspeni
title: The Goal Standard Challenge: The Productivity 'Secret' Needed to Make Progress on Your Goal
text:
The Goal Standard Challenge The Goal Standard Challenge: The Productivity 'Secret' Needed to Make Progress on Your Goal In a Facebook Live, productivity coach Chris Winfield shares tips on how to defeat procrastination and tap into the power of continuous improvement on a daily basis. Reader Resource 
Join Entrepreneur’s The Goal Standard Challenge and make 2017 yours. Learn more » 
Before the official start of The Goal Standard Challenge on Jan. 30, productivity expert Chris Winfield discusses how to tap into the power of continuous improvement and movement on a daily basis to help achieve your goal. 
In his first Facebook Live, Winfield dives into mindset "hacks", how to defeat procrastination and how to set yourself up for success with simple actions. 
Check out his video here, and if you haven’t signed up for The Goal Standard Challenge, sign up below to learn more. 
Also join our Facebook Group to get updates, real-time support and be part of a community full of achievers, just like you. 
Here is the Mindset Quiz to get you started, along with the Don't Break the Chain calendar. Andrea Huspeni
